title: INTERVIEW with HUGO CHAVEZ TERAN on VENEZUELA'S SUCCESS AND U.S. IMPERIALISM
description:
This is an interview with Hugo Chavez Teran, the nephew of the great Venezuelan leader, Hugo Chavez. The interview is conducted by Carlos L. Garrido, philosophy professor, Director of the Midwestern Marx Institute, and Secretary of Education for the American Communist Party, and Grayson Walker, member of the Infrared Collective and the Politburo of the American Communist Party. 

Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:11 - How was power transferred so smoothly to a new generation of revolutionary leaders?
2:33 - How has the Bolivarian revolution survived 25+ years of U.S. imperialist hybrid warfare?
5:40 - What would you like to tell Americans? 
9:55 - Conclusion
